name: British United Provident Association Limited
goal:
Customers are at the heart of everything we do. We fund and provide health and care services to fulfil our purpose of helping people live longer, healthier, happier lives.
Our core strategic framework has three elements: customers, people and performance which are underpinned by three operating principles: invest in strength and depth; win localy enabled globally; ever-focused on quality, efficiency, safety and compliance.
Our values are: passionate, open, caring, authentic, accountable, courageous, extraordinary.
Bupa's purpose and values guide everything we do.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health
euInitiatives: The General Data Protection Regulation; the Network and Information Security Directive; the Privacy and Electronic Commnications Directive and proposed e-Privacy Regulation; the Payment Services Directive II; and the Digital Economy Agenda; Solvency II compliance; and modern slavery.
